amendment.description: To make available an additional $450,000,000 for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-wide and provide an offsetting reduction for a certain military intelligence program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4533 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4533 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6386) To make available an additional $450,000,000 for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-wide and provide an offsetting reduction for a certain military intelligence program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4533 proposed by Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4533 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
